Name: Honolulu Juicer
Ingredients: 30 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
45 ml Southern/Louisiana-style whisky liqueur (e.g. Southern Comfort)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of pineapple wedge & Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
STRAIN into glass filled with crushed ice.
Review: A practically tropical, rum laced, fruity number.
History: A new cocktail to Difford's Guide in 2006, but beyond its originating before then, its origins are unknown.
Nutrition: One serving of Honolulu Juicer contains 240 calories
